statements: SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT id, equipment_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE expiry_date > '2022-09-30' AND location = 'Storage Room';
SELECT id, equipment_name, location FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, expiry_date FROM inventory WHERE location='Warehouse A' ORDER BY expiry_date ASC;
SELECT id, equipment_name FROM inventory WHERE expiry_date < '2023-01-01' AND quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_items, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory WHERE location='Warehouse B';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE location='Warehouse C' AND expiry_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY quantity DESC, equipment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT name, location FROM equipment WHERE id = 5
SELECT id, name, expiry_date FROM equipment ORDER BY expiry_date DESC
SELECT id, name, location FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse'
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE expiry_date >= '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT name, location FROM equipment WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse A'
SELECT id, location, expiry_date FROM equipment WHERE name LIKE '%Tools%'
SELECT * FROM supplies ORDER BY expiry_date ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM inventory_equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supply_name, location FROM inventory_supplies WHERE expiry_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM inventory_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_address FROM inventory_locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'Ware%';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity FROM inventory_equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT supply_name, quantity, location FROM inventory_supplies ORDER BY supply_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_locations WHERE location_address LIKE '%Main Street%';
SELECT supply_name, location, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM inventory_supplies GROUP BY supply_name, location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT equipment_name, location, DATE_FORMAT(expiry_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_expiry_date FROM inventory_equipment WHERE expiry_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY expiry_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, location FROM Equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM Supplies WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM Supplies ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT location_name, address FROM Locations WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, location FROM Equipment WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM Supplies WHERE expiry_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Equipment INNER JOIN Locations ON Equipment.location = Locations.location_name;
SELECT equipment_name, location, category_name FROM Equipment, Locations, Categories WHERE Equipment.location = Locations.location_name AND Equipment.equipment_id % 2 = 0;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM supplies WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT location_name, category_name FROM locations, categories WHERE locations.location_id = categories.location_id;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT item_name, location FROM supplies WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) FROM equipment JOIN categories ON equipment.equipment_id = categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT location_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM supplies JOIN locations ON supplies.location = locations.location_name GROUP BY location_name HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
